member.name: M:CompulsoryAssignment1Assignment1.Book.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor, takes no arguments and creates an empty book object.

member.name: M:CompulsoryAssignment1Assignment1.Book.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Book constructor that takes all the properties as arguments, so you can set the properties when creating the object.
member.param: The title of the book (type string), must be 2 characters minimum
The authour of the book (type string)
The total number of pages in the book (type int), must be 10 pages or more, up to and including 1000 pages
The isbn13 corresponding to the book (type string), must be 13 characters in length

member.name: P:CompulsoryAssignment1Assignment1.Book.Title
member.summary: The property for getting and setting the title of a book, type string (minimum of 2 characters)

member.name: P:CompulsoryAssignment1Assignment1.Book.Authour
member.summary: The property for getting and setting the authour of a book, type string

member.name: P:CompulsoryAssignment1Assignment1.Book.PageNumber
member.summary: The property for getting and setting the total page count of a book, type int (must be a value of 10 or higher, up to and including 1000)

member.name: P:CompulsoryAssignment1Assignment1.Book.ISBN13
member.summary: The property for getting and setting the ISBN13 of the book, type string (must be 13 characters long)
